root: ^Hey kid, I see you got the Purple flowers.
^Do you need help with making the arrangement?
^No need. I know how to make myself a basic arrangement.
^But if you want, you can come meet me at the graveyard tomorrow. I'll have the flowers ready by then.
^So you get to say hello to my wife and daughter. With all the help you've done around the village, I'm sure they'll be happy to see you send them off.
^I love that idea, I'll be sure meet you there.
^Still, I'm really sorry to hear what happen to your wife and daughter.
^Like I said kid, it ain't your fault.
^B-but, if only I became a Royal Flower Picker sooner, maybe I could have picked some medicinal flowers to help with their illness.
^Well, there's not much you can do now. Who knows, maybe you would have been assigned to a different village entirely. It's not much use thinking about it, only what you could do moving foward.
^You only got assigned here because of how dire our situation is here.
^Just do whatever is in your power and help as many people as you can in your reach.
^Just like what you've done for this village.
^Thanks. Ok, I'll meet you tomorrow at the graveyard.
